name: Trust For Retailers And Retail Associates Of India(TRRAIN)

address: TRRAIN,Care of ILFS TRUST COMPANY LTD, THE ILFS FINANICIAL CENTRE
304 - B wing, Eureka Towers Mindspace,  Link Road, Malad (W), Mumbai 400064 Tel: 022 - 28443256/58/59/60

briefDescription: Trust for Retailers & Retail Associates of India (TRRAIN) founded by B S NAGESH is committed to Empowering People in Retail. Since year of inception, TRRAIN has launched various initiatives - providing training & livelihood to People with Disabilities(PwD); skill development program, TRRAIN Retail Awards and Retail Employees Day. TRRAIN has support 60 PwD till date. It has also launched TRRAIN Education Fund and Medical Fund to provide financial assistance to retail associates.
